verses.text: Unto \w the|strong="H0413"\w* end, \w a|strong="H5375"\w* psalm \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. Judge \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* walked \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* innocence: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H5375"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* trust \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H1732"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* weakened.

Prove \w me|strong="H0341"\w*, \w O|strong="H0430"\w* Lord, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* try \w me|strong="H0341"\w*; burn \w my|strong="H0982"\w* reins \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H0982"\w* heart.

\w For|strong="H3605"\w* thy mercy \w is|strong="H1571"\w* \w before|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* eyes; \w and|strong="H0954"\w* \w I|strong="H1571"\w* am \w well|strong="H1571"\w* pleased \w with|strong="H3605"\w* thy truth.

\w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H1870"\w* sat \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* council \w of|strong="H3068"\w* vanity: neither \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3045"\w* go \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* doers \w of|strong="H3068"\w* unjust things.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0859"\w* hated \w the|strong="H3605"\w* assembly \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* malignant; \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wicked \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* sit.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* wash \w my|strong="H3068"\w* hands \w among|strong="H5769"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* innocent; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* compass thy altar, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*:

\w That|strong="H4616"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* hear \w the|strong="H3068"\w* voice \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thy praise: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* tell \w of|strong="H3068"\w* all thy wondrous works.

\w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* loved, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* beauty \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thy house; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* place \w where|strong="H5921"\w* thy glory dwelleth.

Take \w not|strong="H1870"\w* away \w my|strong="H3925"\w* soul, O God, \w with|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* wicked: nor \w my|strong="H3925"\w* \w life|strong="H4941"\w* \w with|strong="H4941"\w* bloody men:

\w In|strong="H3068"\w* \w whose|strong="H3605"\w* hands \w are|strong="H3068"\w* iniquities: \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w right|strong="H0571"\w* hand \w is|strong="H3068"\w* filled \w with|strong="H3068"\w* gifts.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H3588"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* walked \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* innocence: redeem \w me|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w My|strong="H3068"\w* foot hath stood \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* direct \w way|strong="H1870"\w*: \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* churches \w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* bless thee, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.
